name: Split Duplicity v1.1
description:
Split Duplicity is a first-person puzzle platformer designed to be frustrating. Have fun!

WASD to move. Left-mouse click to interact. Spacebar for splitmode. ESC for pause.

Table, Statue, Book, Pencil, Cup, Lamp, Stool and Clock Assets | Jake Palandri | Sketchfab

Programming, Design and Other Modelling Assets | Ashlee Nielsen - Website

Please, if possible, complete this survey on the game to help improve it.
